ISSUE.TITLE: Email format validation error shows incorrectly upon registering
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Describe the bug The registration page renders the email format validation error incorrectly. ### To Reproduce Steps to reproduce the behavior: 1. Enable the `Users Registration` feature 2. Configure the Users Registration settings to allow registration 3. Try to register with an invalid email format 4. See error ### Expected behavior The validation error should describe the error. ### Screenshots ![image](https://github.com/OrchardCMS/OrchardCore/assets/99020631/62f33c35-70b8-4515-b0d0-79b7840ba6fb)
